scripts.init: npm run install-all && npm run db-reset && npm run dev
scripts.refresh: npm run db-push && npm run dev
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd raktar-backend && npm install && cd ../raktar-frontend && npm install
scripts.db-push: npm run db-generate && cd raktar-backend && npx prisma db push && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db-reset: npm run db-generate && cd raktar-backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force --skip-seed && npx prisma db push && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db-seed: cd raktar-backend && npx prisma db seed
